verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On bended knee I come With a humble heart I come. Bowing down before Your holy throne Lifting holy hands to You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As I pledge my love anew. I worship You in spirit I worship You in truth Make my life a holy praise unto You.{/lang-eng}
